mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PSY_TEST_QUESTION_KO WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}

SELECT q.question_id, q.content_id, q.question_no, q.question_text, c.choice_id, c.choice_no, c.choice_text, c.score FROM PSY_TEST_QUESTION_KO q INNER JOIN PSY_TEST_CHOICE_KO c ON q.question_id = c.question_id WHERE q.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY q.question_no ASC, c.choice_no ASC

SELECT q.question_id, q.content_id, q.question_no, q.question_text, c.choice_id, c.choice_no, c.choice_text, c.score FROM PSY_TEST_QUESTION_EN q INNER JOIN PSY_TEST_CHOICE_EN c ON q.question_id = c.question_id WHERE q.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY q.question_no ASC, c.choice_no ASC

SELECT q.question_id, q.content_id, q.question_no, q.question_text, c.choice_id, c.choice_no, c.choice_text, c.score FROM PSY_TEST_QUESTION_JP q INNER JOIN PSY_TEST_CHOICE_JP c ON q.question_id = c.question_id WHERE q.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY q.question_no ASC, c.choice_no ASC
